column4: when your system is updated with updatemanager, than the adobe is updated too. (if you ar installed it with the ubuntu's packagemanager)
So I don't need to update it manually?  The new version is 9.3, and the version I have is 9.2.  If they put it in the repo it will update with the next time I apply updates?

sorry for late answere. I dont know the package maintainer when upgrade the acrobat reader. if u want to the newest download it from adobe: http://get.adobe.com/reader/ and install it from commandline
